entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 60
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

AREAS OF FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

PATCHY FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
